node.title: National Sandwich Day 2021: The Best Deals and Lunch Offers
node.description: National Sandwich Day takes place on November 3, meaning some big brands from Subway to White Castle are celebrating with deals and events.
node.content:
["National Sandwich Day is upon us, kicking off all over the country on November 3. That means at some of your favorite sandwich joints, there will be deals, freebies and even charity events.", "From Schlotzsky's to Subway, there are events taking place at restaurants, fast food and sandwich outlets to commemorate this day, which celebrates all things sandwiched in two slices of bread.", "
Subway
", "At Subway, not only can you get a freebie but you can also give a free meal away to someone in need.", "For National Sandwich Day, Subway is running The Good Deed Feed which means those who buy a sub and any drink on November 3 will receive a free sub of equal or lesser value.", "But as well as giving away a free sub, Subway will also donate one meal to Feeding America.", "President and CEO of Subway Suzanne Greco said: \"One in eight Americans are going hungry, and we're in the business of feeding people.", "\"Many of our franchisees have been committed to fighting hunger in their communities for years, and we're proud of The Good Deed Feed and the impact it will have on a national level.\"", "As well as that, customers can also access a custom National Sandwich Day Snapchat filter that can be unlocked in the restaurant, only on November 3.", "
White Castle
", "Though not a sandwich shop, White Castle is getting in on the action and launching a deal for November 3 only.", "The deal is a buy one, get one free deal, where with any original or cheese slider, you can get another for free.", "To get the deal, head to the website and download the coupon which will allow you to get the deal.", "
Schlotzsky's
", "Schlotzsky's is also doing a deal for those who visit the store or buy online on November 3.", "Using the Schlotzsky's app, customers can buy a medium sandwich for just $5 on National Sandwich Day, with a limit of five discounted medium sandwiches per purchase.", "These can be ordered online or in store, but are not valid on small or large sandwiches.", "
McAlister's Deli
", "McAlister's Deli is launching a National Sandwich Day deal which will actually last for two weeks, ending on November 17.", "Rewards members will be credited a buy one, get one half price deal in their accounts on November 3, which can be used until November 17.", "It can't be combined with other deals and is not available at every location, so head to your local McAlister's to see if they have a deal.", "
Potbelly
", "The Potbelly sandwich shop is also doing a deal for one day only, which is available online, in store and on the app.", "It is another buy one, get one free deal, which means you can get an original or big sandwich free when you buy one on November 3.", "", "
Schlotzsky\u2019s sandwiches
"]
